description: PIMS 461 BD FSP Banglsdesh Coastal and Wetland Biodiversity Management at Cox's Bazar and Hakaluki Haor

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Output 1: To ensure the conservation and sustainable use of globally significant wetland biodiversity at the Cox’s Bazar sites through their management as ECAs.
Output2: To ensure the conservation and sustainable use of globally significant wetland biodiversity at Hakaluki Haor through its management as an ECA
Output3: To support efforts by DOE to institutionalize the concept of ECA management using the experience gained through the above demonstration sites
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: PIMS 461 BD FSP: CWBMP
